version_description:
January brings lots of yummy stuff:

– New animations throughout the game: try to catch a Golden Cookie or share your result on Facebook and you’ll be amazed!
– The game icons disappear when a Golden Cookie is about to fall: no more excuses for not catching it!
– The avatars of your friends are arranged nicely when they are on the same level
– Turn off the falling cookies background in Settings to improve performance if needed

Bake lots of cookies and don’t forget to rate us after every update!

January brings lots of yummy stuff:

– New animations throughout the game: try to catch a Golden Cookie or share your result on Facebook and you’ll be amazed!
– The game icons disappear when a Golden Cookie is about to fall: no more excuses for not catching it!
– The avatars of your friends are arranged nicely when they are on the same level
– Turn off the falling cookies background in Settings to improve performance if needed

Bake lots of cookies and don’t forget to rate us after every update!

Warm your winter with our new crunchy update:

– Cookie Snitch has arrived from Level 10! If you manage to be very quick and catch it… you’ll win great prizes!
– Animations are improved throughout the game.
– Chinese and Japanese translations have been added! You can switch the language of the game in Settings.

Bake lots of cookies and don’t forget to rate us after every update!

New update has arrived, as crunchy as ever:

– Upgrade your Time Machine to make it stronger and faster - find a new Upgrade button on the Time Machine screen
– Look at the badge on the Lucky Spin button to know how many free spins you have
– Performance improved - enjoy!
– We’ve added plenty of videos - they should not finish now

Bake lots of cookies and don’t forget to rate us after every update!

New cookie update brings a huge crunchy feature: Time Warps. Want to get a huge number of cookies instantly and rise in the leaderboards? Bake one day cookie production with a push of a button!

We also fixed several bugs to make gameplay smoother.

Bake lots of cookies and don't forget to rate us after every update!

A new update is waiting for you… Get ready to be amazed!
A new super fun minigame has arrived, the Cookie Dozer! Trying your luck has never been so easy or entertaining: use your golden cookies to collect even more golden cookies and win fabulous prizes! Watch out though, it's not just a matter of luck but also a matter of skill.

Bake lots of cookies and dont forget to rate us after every update!

The most cookie-filled update is here:

– OMG! 5 NEW LEVELS have finally arrived! What are you waiting for? Get those goals completed!
– As you play, you will be awarded stars for each achievement you complete. You will even be able to see achievements you complete in the levels ahead of you on the map!
– We have fixed a few bugs to make your playing experience even better!

Bake lots of cookies and don't forget to rate us after every update!

This update is filled to the brim with exciting news!

– 5 NEW UPGRADES have arrived! Discover and try them all to shoot your CPS to the stars!
– Open Cookie Clickers 2 for a nice surprise, the new Daily Reward! Every day you'll find a gift waiting for you
– The leaderboards have been improved: discover what your position is on the leaderboard and take a look at the new leaderboards by country

Bake lots of cookies and don't forget to rate us after every update!

A crunchy new update has arrived:

– Do you want to get the most out of your Cookie Clickers 2 playing experience? Now you can! A new performance optimization menu is now available! Here you can activate and deactivate certain graphic effects, animations, and much more!
– We have resolved a few bugs in order to make your gaming experience even more fluid and fun!

Bake lots of cookies and don't forget to rate us after every update!

A crunchy new update has arrived:

– Do you want to get the most out of your Cookie Clickers 2 playing experience? Now you can! A new performance optimization menu is now available! Here you can activate and deactivate certain graphic effects, animations, and much more!
– We have resolved a few bugs in order to make your gaming experience even more fluid and fun!

Bake lots of cookies and don't forget to rate us after every update!

A crunchy new update has arrived:

– Do you want to get the most out of your Cookie Clickers 2 playing experience? Now you can! A new performance optimization menu is now available! Here you can activate and deactivate certain graphic effects, animations, and much more!
– We have resolved a few bugs in order to make your gaming experience even more fluid and fun!

Bake lots of cookies and don't forget to rate us after every update!

Cookie Clickers 2 is ready for Halloween!

The famous clickable cookie has dressed up as a jack-o'-lantern for the occasion. Discover all of the spooky new features... don't be afraid!

Bake lots of cookies and don't forget to rate us after every update!

Cookie Clickers 2 is ready for Halloween!

The famous clickable cookie has dressed up as a jack-o'-lantern for the occasion. Discover all of the spooky new features... don't be afraid!

Bake lots of cookies and don't forget to rate us after every update!

Are you ready for the most exciting Cookie Clickers 2 update ever?

Now you can finally play.... COOKIE DOMINATION! Battle "Clickers" from all over the world in this spectacular competition!
Now that the most anticipated chapter of Cookies Clickers is available on your device, just click until you see the new leaderboard and GET READY TO DOMINATE!

Bake lots of cookies and don't forget to rate us after every update!

Bake lots of cookies and don't forget to rate us after every update!
